page.title: 15VILLAGE CHANGES SINCE 1900.
page.content: and thirty-nine homes have one car only. 3d.36% of homes have a car covering a mileage in excess of 200miles per week.Only 18% of homes have a vehicle that travels less than 50 miles per week. 4a.It's interesting to find out how country homes are mainly heated in 1985.From the returned questionnaires it became obvious that many homes have more than one main kind of heating. ELECTRICITY 19, SOLID FUEL 45, WOOD 39, GAS-CONTAINER 12, OIL 28. 4b.Interesting answers were given to the main ways of cooking. ELECTRICITY 73, SOLID FUEL 19, WOOD 8 GAS-CONTAINER 9 OIL 1. 5a.FAMILY SIZES PER HOUSEHOLD. Total number in each home.Eleven homes have a family size of eleven, eighteen have five per family, thirty-one have
